item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0536; 10:11AM; 119 S Av 55; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dPmPGb; Highland Park; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving 24 firefighters (prior to arrival of the additionally requested task force) extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was located in a mezzanine above the office of a 4 bay auto/paint shop. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E201 E212 E250 E42 E47 E55 RA1 T1 T12 T50; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0536; 09:59AM; 119 S Av 55; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dPmPGb; Highland Park; One story (approx 100' x 50') auto shop with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Initial reports are of possible attic fire.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E201 E212 E47 E55 RA1 T1 T12; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0465; 09:55AM; 3067 Mandeville Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Au1g5E; Brentwood; LAFD Air Ops located an injured mountain biker in an area inaccessible by ground resources. They are preparing to conduct a hoist rescue to retrieve and transport the 56 yo male patient with several traumatic injuries. The helicopter will remain on scene for an extended duration (estimate 20 mins) due to the care needed in packaging the patient for the hoist. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 9:11AM. No further details.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC9 BP19 E19 E237 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 RA37 RH114 T37; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#0829; 02:33PM; 865 Paseo Miramar; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wQzGPl; #PacificPalisades; LAFD responded to an injured hiker in a remote area of Pacific Palisades to find one adult female unable to hike out to her vehicle due to pain/injury. Air Operations will hoist her and transport to a local hospital by air. Nothing further.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 BC9 E23 E269 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA69 RH114 T69; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1184; 05:36PM; 6535 N Mary Ellen Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wsQFXI; #ValleyGlen; Firefighters arrived to find flames coming from a single-family home, impinging on a neighboring home, which sustained some damage. It took 58 firefighters 44 minutes to extinguish the flames. One patient and two firefighters were transported to the hospital in non-life-threatening condition. LAFD Arson investigators are responding to perform the fire cause investigation, which remains active.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 BC14 CE83 CM40 CM42 E102 E227 E239 E260 E289 E39 E60 E61 E88 E89 PH1 RA102 RA839 T27 T39 T60 T89; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1163; 04:54PM; 13958 S Fox St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pBtBSN; #Pacoima; It took 26 firefighters 17 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause/loss TBD.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E287 E298 E75 E98 RA75 RA91 T75 T87 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1184; 04:52PM; 6535 N Mary Ellen Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wsQFXI; #ValleyGlen; One-story single-family home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E260 E289 E60 E89 RA102 RA839 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1163; 04:37PM; 13958 S Fox St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pBtBSN; #Pacoima; One-story home with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E287 E298 E75 E98 RA75 T75 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1029; 03:15PM; 420 S Westlake Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KfStZz; #Westlake; Firefighters located a fire (contents only) in one third-floor unit of a five-story center-hallway apartment building. The fire was quickly extinguished and firefighters are now mechanically ventilating the structure (blowers) for smoke removal. No reported injuries related to the fire. Cause under investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC5 E13 E20 E203 E211 E220 E29 RA26 SQ21 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0676; 12:34PM; 3606 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TbIqJ9; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; It took 45 firefighters to access, confine, and extinguish the flames in 45 minutes without injury, inside of a one-story vacant commercial building. Cause/loss TBD.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E215 E226 E26 E261 E294 E34 E68 E94 EM18 RA34 T15 T26 T61 T94; CH9; 15; Nicholas Prange
